comment: He's a great guy who cares about biology. He is a little picky about grading but he doesn't take too many point off. Approachable professor and I would recommend taking him for Bio 1108. Had to write up 3 manuscripts, 3 labsters, and had a handful of assignments. Boring assignments but passed the class with an A.
He's a good lab professor. I would take him again if he taught other labs. He's not slow to grade like my other lab professors and he'd nice. Also not a dinosaur like some of my other professors.
Take this Professor, I'm serious!! You will not regret it. He is very understanding and will work with you. Recorded lectures corresponds with the labs, WATCH THE RECORDED LECTURES.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: The lab is easy, pig dissection and ecology lab are the only ones difficult. Just spend time writing lab reports and your fine.
He takes the writing assignments/labs seriously... but gives good feedback and will work with you.

Very laid back lab professor. He makes the lab straightforward and easy to complete. For every lab so far I have been able to leave early because we can get straight into working. He is lenient about grading, so if you do the work, then you will do well in the class. There is no pre-lab and straightforward and simple expectations for the class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.
